biocontainers.name: chromatiblock
biocontainers.summary: Scalable, whole-genome visualisation of structural changes in prokaryotes.

biotools.summary:
A scalable whole-genome visualization of structural differences in prokaryotes.

Colinear block visualisation tool.

To create a fresh environment for chromatiblock to run in do:.

Scalable, whole-genome visualisation of structural changes in prokaryotes.

Will run chromatiblock on all fasta or genbank files in /path/to/fasta_directory/ and create an interactive webpage of the output. Intermediate files will be created in cb_working_dir
